name: COHREP_Operations1
description: Global Operations dimension data with no security. Examples: Item type, buyers,  categories, etc

pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Item_Type = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)SELECT#(lf)  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)  FLV.LOOKUP_CODE ITEM_TYPE_CODE,#(lf)  MEANING ITEM_TYPE_NAME,#(lf)  ENABLED_FLAG,#(lf)  FLV.start_date_Active,#(lf)  flv.end_date_Active#(lf)FROM#(lf)  APPS.FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL FLV#(lf)WHERE#(lf)  LOOKUP_TYPE = 'ITEM_TYPE'#(lf)  AND VIEW_APPLICATION_ID= 3#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ITEM_TYPE_CODE", "Item Type Code"}, {"ITEM_TYPE_NAME", "Item Type Name"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ENABLED_FLAG", "Enabled Flag"}, {"START_DATE_ACTIVE", "Start Date Active"}, {"END_DATE_ACTIVE", "End Date Active"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Sales_Commodity = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)SELECT#(lf)  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)  category_id,#(lf)  segment1 COMMODITY#(lf)FROM#(lf)  apps.mtl_categories_v MC#(lf)WHERE#(lf)  structure_name = 'Commodity'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"COMMODITY", "Sales Commodity"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Sourcing_Commodity = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)SELECT#(lf)  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)  category_id,#(lf)  segment1,#(lf)  segment2 SUBCATEGORY,#(lf)  segment3 UNSPSC_CODE,#(lf)  MC.SEGMENT1 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT2 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT3 SOURCING_COMMODITY#(lf)FROM#(lf)  apps.mtl_categories_v MC#(lf)WHERE#(lf)  structure_name = 'Sourcing Commodity'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"SOURCING_COMMODITY", "Sourcing Commodity"}, {"SUBCATEGORY", "Sourcing Subcategory"}, {"UNSPSC_CODE", "UNSPSC Code"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Product_Category = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "  #(lf)SELECT#(lf)   SYSDATE EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)   MC.CATEGORY_ID,#(lf)   MC.SEGMENT1 TBU,#(lf)   MC.SEGMENT2 PRODUCT_FAMILY,#(lf)   MC.SEGMENT3 PRODUCT_LINE,#(lf)   MC.SEGMENT4 FORECAST,#(lf)   MC.SEGMENT1 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT2 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT3 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT4 PRODUCT_CATEGORY #(lf)FROM#(lf)   APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC #(lf)WHERE 1=1#(lf)AND Structure_name = 'Product Family/Line'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Product Family"}, {"FORECAST", "Forecast Field"}, {"PRODUCT_LINE", "Product Line"}, {"PRODUCT_CATEGORY", "Product Category"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Account = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)select#(lf)   sysdate  EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)   VL.FLEX_VALUE ACCOUNT,#(lf)   TL.DESCRIPTION ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION,#(lf)   VL.ENABLED_FLAG#(lf)from#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_TL TL,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES VL,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FST #(lf)where#(lf)   1 = 1 #(lf)   AND TL.FLEX_VALUE_ID( + ) = VL.FLEX_VALUE_ID #(lf)   AND TL.LANGUAGE ( + ) = 'US' #(lf)   AND VL.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID #(lf)   AND FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'COHR_Acct'#(lf)"]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ACCOUNT", "GL Account Code"}, {"ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION", "GL Account"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ENABLED_FLAG", "Enabled Flag"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Department = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)select#(lf)   sysdate  EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)   VL.FLEX_VALUE DEPARTMENT_CODE,#(lf)   TL.DESCRIPTION,#(lf)   VL.ENABLED_FLAG#(lf)from#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_TL TL,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES VL,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FST #(lf)where#(lf)   1 = 1 #(lf)   AND TL.FLEX_VALUE_ID( + ) = VL.FLEX_VALUE_ID #(lf)   AND TL.LANGUAGE ( + ) = 'US' #(lf)   AND VL.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID #(lf)   AND FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'COHR_Dept'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),

in

  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)select#(lf)#(tab)sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)   VL.FLEX_VALUE PROJECT_CODE,#(lf)   TL.DESCRIPTION, VL.ENABLED_FLAG#(lf)from#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_TL TL,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES VL,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FST #(lf)where#(lf)   1 = 1 #(lf)   AND TL.FLEX_VALUE_ID( + ) = VL.FLEX_VALUE_ID #(lf)   AND TL.LANGUAGE ( + ) = 'US' #(lf)   AND VL.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID #(lf)   AND FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'COHR_Proj'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),

  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = " SELECT#(lf)    sysdate                                                                                       extract_date,#(lf)    al1.period_date                                                                               calendar_date,#(lf)    al1.year_start_date                                                                           fc_year_start_date,#(lf)    al1.period_year                                                                               fc_year,#(lf)    al1.quarter_start_date                                                                        fc_quarter_start_date,#(lf)    'Q' || al1.quarter_num                                                                        fc_quarter,#(lf)    CASE#(lf)        WHEN al1.quarter_num <= 2 THEN#(lf)            'H1'#(lf)        ELSE#(lf)            'H2'#(lf)    END fc_half,#(lf)    al1.period_num                                                                                fc_period_number,#(lf)    substr(al1.period_name, 1, 3)                                                                 fc_period_month,#(lf)    al1.period_name                                                                               fc_period_name,#(lf)    ( al1.period_year - TO_DATE('02-OCT-1999', 'DD-MON-RRRR')) / 7)                           fc_week_id,#(lf)    al1.period_year - (#(lf)        SELECT#(lf)            ( cd.period_year )#(lf)        FROM#(lf)            (#(lf)                SELECT#(lf)                    gdpm.period_set_name,#(lf)                    gp.period_name,#(lf)                    gdpm.accounting_date period_date,#(lf)                    gp.period_year,#(lf)                    gp.period_num,#(lf)                    gp.quarter_num,#(lf)                    gp.year_start_date,#(lf)                    gp.quarter_start_date#(lf)                FROM#(lf)                    gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,#(lf)                    gl.gl_periods            gp#(lf)                WHERE#(lf)                        gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'#(lf)                    AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name#(lf)                    AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name#(lf)                    AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)#(lf)            ) cd#(lf)    ) fc_year_offset,#(lf)    ( ( al1.period_year - 1 ) * 4 + al1.quarter_num ) - (#(lf)        SELECT#(lf)            ( cd.period_year - 1 ) * 4 + cd.quarter_num#(lf)        FROM#(lf)            (#(lf)                SELECT#(lf)                    gdpm.period_set_name,#(lf)                    gp.period_name,#(lf)                    gdpm.accounting_date period_date,#(lf)                    gp.period_year,#(lf)                    gp.period_num,#(lf)                    gp.quarter_num,#(lf)                    gp.year_start_date,#(lf)                    gp.quarter_start_date#(lf)                FROM#(lf)                    gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,#(lf)                    gl.gl_periods            gp#(lf)                WHERE#(lf)                        gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'#(lf)                    AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name#(lf)                    AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name#(lf)                    AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)#(lf)            ) cd#(lf)    ) fc_quarter_offset,#(lf)    ( ( al1.period_year - 1 ) * 12 + al1.period_num ) - (#(lf)        SELECT#(lf)            ( cd.period_year - 1 ) * 12 + cd.period_num#(lf)        FROM#(lf)            (#(lf)                SELECT#(lf)                    gdpm.period_set_name,#(lf)                    gp.period_name,#(lf)                    gdpm.accounting_date period_date,#(lf)                    gp.period_year,#(lf)                    gp.period_num,#(lf)                    gp.quarter_num,#(lf)                    gp.year_start_date,#(lf)                    gp.quarter_start_date#(lf)                FROM#(lf)                    gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,#(lf)                    gl.gl_periods            gp#(lf)                WHERE#(lf)                        gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'#(lf)                    AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name#(lf)                    AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name#(lf)                    AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)#(lf)            ) cd#(lf)    ) fc_period_offset,#(lf)    ( al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date ) + 1                                                 doy_number,#(lf)    ( al1.period_date - trunc(sysdate) )                                                          fc_day_offset,#(lf)    CASE#(lf)        WHEN ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7) < 10 THEN#(lf)            'W0'#(lf)            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7)#(lf)        ELSE#(lf)            'W'#(lf)            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7)#(lf)    END fc_week,#(lf)    CASE#(lf)        WHEN ceil((al1.period_date - al1.quarter_start_date + 1) / 7) < 10 THEN#(lf)            'QW0'#(lf)            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.quarter_start_date + 1) / 7)#(lf)        ELSE#(lf)            'QW'#(lf)            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.quarter_start_date + 1) / 7)#(lf)    END fc_quarter_week,#(lf)    ceil((al1.period_date - TO_DATE('02-OCT-1999', 'DD-MON-RRRR')) / 7) - ceil(((trunc(sysdate)) - TO_DATE('02-OCT-1999', 'DD-MON-RRRR')) /#(lf)    7) fc_week_offset,#(lf)    ( al1.period_year * 100 + ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7) )               fc_week_series,#(lf)    ( al1.period_year * 100 + al1.period_num )                                                      fc_period_series,#(lf)    ( al1.period_year * 10 + al1.quarter_num )                                                      fc_quarter_series,#(lf)    ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7)  fc_week_number,#(lf)    to_char(al1.period_date, 'DAY')                                                                 day_name,#(lf)    to_char(al1.period_date, 'D')                                                                  dow_number#(lf)FROM#(lf)    (#(lf)        SELECT#(lf)            gdpm.period_set_name,#(lf)            gp.period_name,#(lf)            gdpm.accounting_date period_date,#(lf)            gp.period_year,#(lf)            gp.period_num,#(lf)            gp.quarter_num,#(lf)            gp.year_start_date,#(lf)            gp.quarter_start_date#(lf)        FROM#(lf)            gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,#(lf)            gl.gl_periods            gp#(lf)        WHERE#(lf)                gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'#(lf)            AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name#(lf)            AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name#(lf)    ) al1", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),

  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf)  SELECT#(lf)  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)  MPN.manufacturer_name,#(lf)  MPN.mfg_part_num,#(lf)  MPN.inventory_item_id,#(lf)  (SELECT#(lf)    MSI.segment1#(lf)  FROM inv.mtl_system_items_b MSI#(lf)  WHERE MSI.inventory_item_id = MPN.inventory_item_id#(lf)  AND rownum = 1)#(lf)  ITEM_NUMBER#(lf)FROM#(lf)  apps.MTL_MFG_PART_NUMBERS_ALL_V MPN#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),

  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "  #(lf)SELECT#(lf)   sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,#(lf)   FVS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME,#(lf)   FVS.DESCRIPTION VALUE_SET_DESCRIPTION,#(lf)   FLV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID,#(lf)   FLV.FLEX_VALUE_ID,#(lf)   FLV.FLEX_VALUE,#(lf)   FLV.FLEX_VALUE_MEANING,#(lf)   FLV.DESCRIPTION VALUE_DESCRIPTION,#(lf)   FLV.END_DATE_ACTIVE,#(lf)   FLV.ENABLED_FLAG#(lf)FROM#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL FLV,#(lf)   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FVS #(lf)WHERE#(lf)   FVS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FLV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID #(lf)   AND UPPER(FVS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME) LIKE '%TBU%'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),

  Source;
shared Organization = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "#(lf) SELECT#(lf)    ood.organization_code,#(lf)    mp.attribute13      organization_type,#(lf)    hou.name            operating_unit,#(lf)    sob.currency_code   functional_currency,#(lf)    sob.short_name,#(lf)    sob.description,#(lf)    ood.organization_id,#(lf)    ood.set_of_books_id#(lf)FROM#(lf)    apps.mtl_parameters                 mp,#(lf)    apps.org_organization_definitions   ood,#(lf)    apps.hr_operating_units             hou,#(lf)    apps.gl_sets_of_books_v             sob#(lf)WHERE#(lf)    mp.organization_id = ood.organization_id#(lf)    AND hou.organization_id = ood.operating_unit#(lf)    AND sob.set_of_books_id = ood.set_of_books_id#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),
  #"Renamed Columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"ORGANIZATION_TYPE", "Organization Type"}, {"OPERATING_UNIT", "Operating Unit"}, {"FUNCTIONAL_CURRENCY", "Functional Currency"}, {"SHORT_NAME", "Short Name"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "Description"}})
in
  #"Renamed Columns";
shared GL_Entity = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [Query = "SELECT#(lf)    sysdate           extract_date,#(lf)    vl.flex_value     Entity,#(lf)    tl.description    Entity_description,#(lf)vl.enabled_flag#(lf)FROM#(lf)    apps.fnd_flex_values_tl     tl,#(lf)    apps.fnd_flex_values        vl,#(lf)    apps.fnd_flex_value_sets    fst#(lf)WHERE#(lf)        1 = 1#(lf)    AND tl.flex_value_id (+) = vl.flex_value_id#(lf)    AND tl.language (+) = 'US'#(lf)    AND vl.enabled_flag = 'Y'#(lf)    AND vl.flex_value_set_id = fst.flex_value_set_id#(lf)    AND fst.flex_value_set_name like 'COHR_Ent'"]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ENTITY", "GL Entity"}, {"ENTITY_DESCRIPTION", "GL Entity Description"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ENABLED_FLAG", "Enabled Flag"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Corporate_FX_Rate = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = " SELECT#(lf) sysdate extract_date,#(lf)    from_currency,#(lf)    to_currency,#(lf)    gdr.conversion_date,#(lf)    gdr.conversion_type,#(lf)    gdr.conversion_Rate usd_rate#(lf)FROM#(lf)    apps.gl_daily_rates_v                gdr#(lf)WHERE#(lf)        conversion_type = 'Corporate'#(lf)    AND to_currency = 'USD'#(lf)", HierarchicalNavigation = true]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"FROM_CURRENCY", "From Currency"}, {"TO_CURRENCY", "To Currency"}, {"CONVERSION_DATE", "Conversion Date"}, {"CONVERSION_TYPE", "Conversion Type"}, {"USD_RATE", "USD Rate"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Budget_Rate = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "SELECT#(cr)#(lf)    currency_code,#(cr)#(lf)    period_year,#(cr)#(lf)    rate_to_usd#(cr)#(lf)FROM#(cr)#(lf)    xxdims.xx_forecast_rates#(cr)#(lf)WHERE#(cr)#(lf)    scenario = 'BUDGET'", CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency Code"}, {"PERIOD_YEAR", "Fiscal Year"}, {"RATE_TO_USD", "Budget Rate"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared APOP_Baseline = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [CommandTimeout = #duration(0, 0, 10, 0), Query = "SELECT#(lf)    inv_org_code,#(lf)    item_number,#(lf)    bp.baseline_usd_price,#(lf)    period_year#(lf)FROM#(lf)    xxdims.xx_po_baseline_price bp", CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"INV_ORG_CODE", "Org"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"BASELINE_USD_PRICE", "Baseline Price USD"}, {"PERIOD_YEAR", "Fiscal Year"}})
in
